QuestData.Title: The Mills Overrun
QuestData.Description: The Scourge are trying to form a base here at the Agamand Mills. If they do, then they can stage further attacks within Tirisfal.$B$BThe orders have been given. The Scourge in the Mills must be destroyed.$B$BCollect Notched Ribs from Rattlecage and Cracked Skull Soldiers, and Blackened Skulls from Darkeye Bonecasters.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 5 Notched Ribs and 3 Blackened Skulls.
QuestData.CompletionText: Our battles with the Scourge wage on, $n. Do your part and throw those cursed, mindless undead back into the Plaguelands!
QuestData.RewardText: Your efforts are appreciated, $n. I will not thank you for doing what is necessary, but I will remember your name.
